sentences.en: As a personal preference, would you like to live in a megacity or a smaller city/town? Why?
sentences.cn: 以个人观点，您喜欢生活在大都市，还是小城市/城镇?为什么犫。

sentences.en: In the competition between the megacity and the holy city, Upadhyay says, "Delhi is winning, of course.
sentences.cn: 大城市和圣城的的较量中，阿帕德海耶说：“当然是德里赢了。”

sentences.en: The proposed "megacity" will be 82,000 square miles --roughly the size of Utah.
sentences.cn: 这个提议中的“巨型城市”面积将达到82000平方英里，相当于犹他州的面积。
